verses.verse: <S%G80>Brethren,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G4301>caught<s%> in <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G3900>trespass,<s%> you who are <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> <S%G2675>restore<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>one<s%> in a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4240>gentleness;<s%> [each one] <S%G4648>looking<s%> to <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> you <S%G2532>too<s%> be <S%G3985>tempted.<s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1380>thinks<s%> he is <S%G5100>something<s%> when he is <S%G3367>nothing,<s%> he <S%G5422>deceives<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

But let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G1381>examine<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G2192>have<s%> [reason for] <S%G2745>boasting<s%> in <S%G1519>regard<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> and not in <S%G1519>regard<s%> to <S%G2087>another.<s%>
And let the one who is <S%G2727>taught<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2841>share<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>things<s%> with him who <S%G2727>teaches.<s%>

Do not be <S%G4105>deceived,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G3456>mocked;<s%> for <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4687>sows,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> he will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2325>reap.<s%>

For the one who <S%G4687>sows<s%> to his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall from the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5356>corruption,<s%> but the one who <S%G4687>sows<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> shall from the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

And let us not <S%G7051>lose<s%> <S%G7051>heart<s%> in <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> for in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> we shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> if we do not <S%G1590>grow<s%> <S%G1590>weary.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then,<s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2540>opportunity,<s%> let us <S%G2038>do<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men,<s%> and <S%G3122>especially<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3609>who<s%> are of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
<S%G3708>See<s%> with <S%G4080>what<s%> <S%G4080>large<s%> <S%G1121>letters<s%> I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> to you with my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

<S%G3745>Those<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2146>make<s%> a <S%G2146>good<s%> <S%G2146>showing<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> try to <S%G315>compel<s%> you to be <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> <S%G3440>simply<s%> that they may not be <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> for the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> do not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G846>themselves,<s%> but they <S%G2309>desire<s%> to have you <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> that they may <S%G2744>boast<s%> in your <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

But may it <S%G3361>never<s%> be that I should <S%G2744>boast,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> in the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> has been <S%G4717>crucified<s%> to me, and I to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

And <S%G3745>those<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> will <S%G4748>walk<s%> by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2583>rule,<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> and <S%G1656>mercy<s%> [be] upon them, and upon the <S%G2474>Israel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
From <S%G3062>now<s%> on let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G3930>cause<s%> <S%G2873>trouble<s%> for me, for I <S%G941>bear<s%> on my <S%G4983>body<s%> the brand-marks of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with your <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
